src:
Tampil Impresif, Kiper Persib I Made Wirawan Enggan Jemawa
03 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Siska Nirmala
PENJAGA gawang Persib Bandung, I Made Wirawan terus menampilkan performa apik dalam beberapa pertandingan terakhir. Tercatat sudah 7 cleansheet dibukukan kiper asal Bali ini selama musim kompetisi 2019. 
Termasuk kemenangan 2-0 Persib atas Kalteng Putra pada Jumat, 1 November 2019 lalu, menjadi cleansheet tiga kali berturut-turut kiper bernomor 78 tersebut. 
Meski tampil impresif, namun Made enggan jemawa. Menurut dia, keberhasilan cleansheet justru merupakan hasil kinerja keras yang dilakukan semua pemain selama ini.
"Yang pasti itu kerja keras semua pemain. Mulai dari barisan belakang, tengah sampai ke depan.  Makanya kita bisa tampil cukup baik," kata Made, Sabtu, 2 November 2019, seperti dilansir laman resmi klub. 
Menurut dia, kebersamaan menjadi kunci keberhasilan Persib memetik hasil positif dalam beberapa pertandingan terakhir. "Kami sudah bisa menemukan kekompakan, terus ada peningkatan. Itu tentu  ditunjang sama semua pemain yang bekerja keras di lapangan. Menyerang bersama, bertahan juga bersama," ujarnya.***

Baca Juga
text:
Appearing Impressive, Persib Goalkeeper I Made Wirawan Reluctant Jemawa
03 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Siska Nirmala
Persib Bandung keeper I Made Wirawan has continued to display slick performance in the last few matches. There have been 7 cleansheets recorded by the goalkeeper from Bali during the 2019 season.
Including Persib 2-0 victory over Kalteng Putra on Friday, November 1, 2019 then, became the cleansheet three times in a row the goalkeeper numbered 78.
Although appearing impressive, but Made reluctant to Javanese. According to him, the cleansheet's success was precisely the result of hard performance performed by all players so far.
"What is certain is the hard work of all players. Starting from the back row, middle to the front. So we can perform quite well," said Made, Saturday, November 2, 2019, as reported by the club's official website.
According to him, togetherness is the key to the success of Persib reaping positive results in the last few matches. "We have been able to find cohesiveness, there has been an increase. That is certainly supported by all the players who work hard on the field. Attacking together, also staying together," he said. ***
